channel.title: 2006Craft | Minecraft Remake of RS | NEW
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://i.imgur.com/Glpk3.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.2006craft.host22.com/img/favicon.ico[/img] [URL=http://2006craft.host22.com]Website[/URL] | [img]http://www.youtube.com/favicon.ico[/img] [URL=http://www.youtube.com/user/2006craft]YouTube[/url] | [img]http://www.bestcoast.us/wp-content/uploads/2012/03/twitter_favicon.png[/img] [URL=http://"http://twitter.com/2006CraftOfficial"]Twitter[/URL]
[B]2006Craft is a go, thanks soo much for the support... But please, can you post on the forums everyday?? It makes us loose motivation :([/B]
[IMG]http://2006craft.host22.com/rune/projectinformation.png[/img] [SIZE=3]2006Craft is a Minecraft server, that is based off Runescape in 2006. Basically Runescape but in Minecraft. We will be bringing you, the Runescape quests, skills, areas, and events all in a 1st person minecraft view![/SIZE]
[IMG]http://2006craft.host22.com/rune/ourgoal.png[/img] [SIZE=3]Our goal is to integrate Runescape and Minecraft bringing you nostalgia and a first person view of Runescape. Because Runescape and Minecraft are in different ways, similar. We can do whatever we want, especially with the help from our Java Programmer, Andrew and with Bukkit![/SIZE]
[IMG]http://2006craft.host22.com/rune/progress.png[/img] [center] [COLOR=Red]Red = Not Done[/Color] [COLOR=Green]Green = Done[/Color] [COLOR=Orange]Orange = In Progress[/Color]
[img]http://www.zybez.net/img/genimg/gettingstart/worldmap.gif[/img][b]World[/b]
[ul][COLOR=Green][list][li]All F2P Areas[/COLOR][/li][/list] [COLOR=Orange][list][li]All hidden areas[/li] [li]All Ways of Traveling[/li] [li]All Buildings converted to 2006[/COLOR][/li][/list] [COLOR=Red][list][li]All P2P Areas[/li] [li]Wilderness[/COLOR][/li] [/list]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/2EJAV.gif[/img][b]Combat[/b] [list] [COLOR=Red][list][li]All ways of Combat Working[/li] [li]You cannot log out while in combat[/li] [li]Wildy, Pking[/COLOR][/li] [/list]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/C2xH2.gif[/img][b]Ranged[/b] [list] [COLOR=Red][list][li]Ranged upgrades[/li] [li]Shops[/COLOR][/li] [/list]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4Ou9K.gif[/img][b]Mining[/b] [list][COLOR=Green] [list][li]All Ores respawn[/li] [li]You can only wield a certain pickaxe at a time[/COLOR][/li] [/list]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Bbq6R.gif[/img][b]Smithing[/b] [list][COLOR=Green] [list][li]Any type of Ore Smelting works[/li] [li]You can repair/create weapons and armour[/COLOR][/li] [/list]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/QrNzk.gif[/img][b]Woodcutting[/b] [list][COLOR=Green] [list][li]All logs will chop and respawn[/li] [li]You use wood to make some types of armour and tools.[/COLOR][/li] [/list]
[b]To be updated...[/b]
[/center]
[IMG]http://2006craft.host22.com/rune/hiring.png[/img] [b][SIZE=5]2006Craft Head Administration[/size][/b] [img]http://www.ng-gaming.net/images/flags/ca.png[/img] [b]Mod King[/b] [img]http://www.ng-gaming.net/images/flags/ca.png[/img] [b]Mod Andrew[/b]
[b][SIZE=5]Website Development Team[/size][/b] [img]http://www.ng-gaming.net/images/flags/us.png[/img] [b]Mod Bane[/b]
[b][SIZE=5]Java Development Team[/size][/b] [img]http://www.ng-gaming.net/images/flags/ca.png[/img] [b]Mod Andrew[/b]
[b][SIZE=5]World Development Team[/size][/b] [img]http://www.ng-gaming.net/images/flags/us.png[/img] [b]Mod Bane[/b]
[B][U]Do you want to join the team?[/U][/B] If you do, please send us "ScapeX" a message with this format [QUOTE] [B]MC Username:[/B] Answer [B]Rune-Server Username:[/B] Answer [B]MoparScape Username:[/B] Answer [B]google Username:[/B] Answer [B]What position:[/B] (Java Developer/Graphics Designer/World Developer) [B]Timezone:[/B] Answer [B]Country:[/B] Answer [B]Why you want to join the team:[/B] Answer [/QUOTE]
[/CENTER] [SIZE=5][CENTER][COLOR=White][B]Lumbridge[/B][/COLOR][/CENTER][/SIZE] [CENTER][IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/5n1644.png[/img][/center][/list][/list][/list][/list][/list][/ul]

item.title: 2006Craft | Minecraft Remake of RS | NEW
item.dc:creator: @2006Craft 2006Craft
item.description:
@2006Craft wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:14, topic:470874”]I’m moving this to Moparcraft, as it’s a minecraft server.

Also, recreating the RS world has already been done – they did the same thing for World of Warcraft as well. However I’m not sure if they did the gameplay at all similar[/quote]

And it’s true, there is a few people out in the world that has re-created the map… Like Podcrash, and the basic Lumbridge Map… But they’re making 2012, we’re making 2006… So it’s a bit different.

Also, we aren’t just recreating the map. We are also re-creating everything that 2006 mainly had, like the skills… Some skills from 2006 Runescape won’t be in there, but a good majority of it will… We will also make quests which will be interesting to do…

Read full topic

item.title: 2006Craft | Minecraft Remake of RS | NEW
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I’m moving this to Moparcraft, as it’s a minecraft server.

Also, recreating the RS world has already been done – they did the same thing for World of Warcraft as well. However I’m not sure if they did the gameplay at all similar

Read full topic

item.title: 2006Craft | Minecraft Remake of RS | NEW
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

Oh this is what I wanted to do >:l
Anyways, this is excellent, you are a true artist with the maps. Please do not quit because I am ecstatic to play this. I am a big fan of mine craft and runescape. I am a big mine craft developer so if you need help with plugins please message me. Good luck!

Also, what do you plan do about the ores? Do they respawn after you mine it?

Read full topic

item.title: 2006Craft | Minecraft Remake of RS | NEW
item.dc:creator: @2006Craft 2006Craft
item.description:
@2006Craft wrote:

[CENTER]

Glpk3.png751×115

Website | YouTube | Twitter

2006Craft is a go, thanks soo much for the support… But please, can you post on the forums everyday?? It makes us loose motivation


[SIZE=3]2006Craft is a Minecraft server, that is based off Runescape in 2006. Basically Runescape but in Minecraft. We will be bringing you, the Runescape quests, skills, areas, and events all in a 1st person minecraft view![/SIZE]


[SIZE=3]Our goal is to integrate Runescape and Minecraft bringing you nostalgia and a first person view of Runescape. Because Runescape and Minecraft are in different ways, similar. We can do whatever we want, especially with the help from our Java Programmer, Andrew and with Bukkit![/SIZE]


[center]
[COLOR=Red]Red = Not Done[/Color]
[COLOR=Green]Green = Done[/Color]
[COLOR=Orange]Orange = In Progress[/Color]

World

[ul][COLOR=Green][list][li]All F2P Areas[/COLOR][/li][/list]
[COLOR=Orange][list][li]All hidden areas[/li]
[li]All Ways of Traveling[/li]
[li]All Buildings converted to 2006[/COLOR][/li][/list]
[COLOR=Red][list][li]All P2P Areas[/li]
[li]Wilderness[/COLOR][/li]
[/list]

Combat
[list]
[COLOR=Red][list][li]All ways of Combat Working[/li]
[li]You cannot log out while in combat[/li]
[li]Wildy, Pking[/COLOR][/li]
[/list]

Ranged
[list]
[COLOR=Red][list][li]Ranged upgrades[/li]
[li]Shops[/COLOR][/li]
[/list]

Mining
[list][COLOR=Green]
[list][li]All Ores respawn[/li]
[li]You can only wield a certain pickaxe at a time[/COLOR][/li]
[/list]

Smithing
[list][COLOR=Green]
[list][li]Any type of Ore Smelting works[/li]
[li]You can repair/create weapons and armour[/COLOR][/li]
[/list]

Woodcutting
[list][COLOR=Green]
[list][li]All logs will chop and respawn[/li]
[li]You use wood to make some types of armour and tools.[/COLOR][/li]
[/list]

To be updated…

[/center]


[SIZE=5]2006Craft Head Administration[/size]
Mod King
Mod Andrew

Mod Andrew
